title: About Travel Express
intro: Travel Express is a student internship project that introduces us to full-stack web development including both Backend and Frontend.
context: This project was created in the context of an internship and the rising pollution and lack of ecological transportation options. Developing a carpooling web application appears to be an essential solution.
eco: With increasing concerns about environmental impact, initiatives encouraging ride-sharing have become a priority. Beyond ecology and saving money, trust is also a central issue.
goal: This project aims to connect users in real-time, simplify trip organization, and promote an economic and ecological alternative to traditional modes of transportation in Quebec, while ensuring safety.
